description: Master Holmes commands his trained wife, Amber, to entertain and sexually service his special guest, Isis, so that their business transaction with be in his favor. Amber is punished, double penetrated and given orgasms by her husband and his sexy business associate. Filmed on The Upper Floor.
title: Subservient Wife
